items.name: Livewire Technologies, Inc.
items.description: LiveWire Technologies, Inc., provides consulting; integration; hosting & SaaS services specific to the technology needs of each of its law firm and corporate legal department clients. With our sixty plus combined years of law firm experience; partnerships with many legal application providers and hands-on technical skills we continue to enjoy long term relationships with our clients.

items.name: Corus360
items.description: Corus360 is a multi-competency Gold Microsoft partner.  We specialize in Azure, Office 365 and Identity Access Security solutions to support our customers in their cloud journey.  We still support on-premise Microsoft solutions such as Active Directory, Exchange, SharePoint, and System Center Management.

items.name: Arw Systems, LLC
items.description:
Viyu offers end-to-end solutions and support for all facets of Information Technology. With a 15-year history of building on relationship driven success, delivering industry proven solutions, and providing unmatched technical support, our customers remain our primary focus.

Accredited partnerships with todays most trusted and respected manufacturers empowers our customers with the opportunity to take advantage of the best solutions that the market has to offer.  

We are the local experts that care about putting names to faces and will always strive to deliver the right solution the right way – It’s time to get to know Viyu.

items.name: ThriveFast, LLC
items.description:
At ThriveFast, we live to find the best solutions for our clients.
Whether your solution is connecting remote users with Office 365 (O365) or bringing a
large enterprise closer together with a customized SharePoint Intranet or Teams rollout;
We have the right solution for your specific needs. We are a Cloud Service Provider and Systems Integrator located in Tulsa, Oklahoma.  We service Tulsa, Broken Arrow, Oklahoma City, Texas, Arkansas, and Missouri.

items.name: VLInteractive.com
items.description:
VLinteractive is a full service digital and web development agency. VLinteractive assists our clients in leveraging new technologies to see bottom line efficiencies and to help clients engage their customers and partners with a focus on Web Development & Hosting Solutions as well as Network & Managed Services.

With over 20 years of invaluable interactive industry experience, our full-service team of strategists, developers and designers can help you find the best results-driven technology solution for your organization. VL offers web design and development, app development, search engine optimization and social media management solutions so you can focus on your business, while we take care of your online strategy.

VLinteractive has completed work for close to 350 clients over the years. Our customer base includes clients located in Canada, the US, and in Europe and includes several government, not-for-profit organizations, as well as, for-profit businesses. We believe that this diversity is one of the strengths that we bring to any new project.

items.name: Turnkey Technologies, Inc.
items.description:
Turnkey Technologies, Inc. is a Gold Microsoft Dynamics Partner focused on serving local, regional, national and international customers since being founded by Chris Gherardini in 1994. Based in St. Louis, Missouri, we have a strong presence throughout the Midwest with consultants in Missouri, Illinois, Utah, Georgia and Michigan. 

Turnkey has established itself as a client-focused business solutions provider. We focus exclusively on the Microsoft Dynamics technology platform and related software products. As a Tier 1 Microsoft Cloud Solution Provider and early adopter of Microsoft’s cloud strategy, Turnkey offers ERP and CRM hosting on our private, secure network hosted in St. Louis or on the Microsoft Azure platform. In unifying business data on a cutting-edge, centralized platform, we enable our customers to bypass the hassle of updates and maintenance so they can focus on the big picture. Our approach has been time-tested. 

For more than 23 years we have satisfied hundreds of clients with proven implementation methodologies, data conversion from any system and cost-effective software customizations. We can extend your solution through our network of world-class independent software vendors (ISVs) to evolve your business systems as your needs expand. Our mission is to deliver Microsoft Dynamics services and quality products in a cost-effective way to the customers we serve. We have a track record of high customer satisfaction and take responsibility for all related project management, deployment, implementation, customization, training and support of your Microsoft solutions.

items.name: Syvantis Technologies, Inc.
items.description:
Syvantis is a Microsoft ERP Gold Partner with 20 years of experience focused on providing cloud ERP and CRM solutions to businesses of all sizes. Recognized as the Microsoft Dynamics SMB ERP US Cloud Partner of the Year for FY15, Syvantis draws on its more than fifteen of years of expertise to implement, train, and support Dynamics GP and Dynamics NAV to clients from a wide range of industries. From discreet manufacturing to print and publication, consultants from Syvantis take the time to learn about their clients’ unique business needs and craft a solution to fulfill them.

From the first call through implementation, Syvantis strives to gather a comprehensive picture of each client in order to provide detailed, upfront, and valuable pricing and product information. Instead of making clients jump through hoops and sit through multiple discovery calls to get pricing, Syvantis consultants provide estimates upfront – often after the very first time clients reach out. For those still in the early stages of their ERP search, a self-service estimation calculator is featured on the Syvantis website. Every implementation and cloud migration project is offered as a fixed-price project to ensure clients never have to worry about scope creep and is completed in as little as 4 to 6 weeks. 

In today’s data-driven world, it is often imperative for businesses to integrate their vital business systems. That’s why Syvantis specializes in integrating Dynamics ERP with a host of other software. Whether clients are looking to integrate with customer relationship management tools such as Microsoft Dynamics CRM or Salesforce, to expense management software such as Concur, or to powerful data visualization tools such as Microsoft Power BI, Syvantis has the expertise in-house to do it.

Long after an implementation project is complete, Syvantis continues to go above and beyond to make sure each client’s system grows and changes as they do. Free, monthly or quarterly meetings with a dedicated consultant give each client the opportunity to ask questions about their system and gain insight into new features and tools on a regular basis. When an issue arises, the Syvantis support team will be ready to triage the problem and create a case so that users can return to their duties quickly.

items.name: Imperitiv
items.description: Imperitiv focuses on the solutions that your business relies on for success. Our team has depth across system management and orchestration, platforms, enterprise security, collaboration and productivity, Azure, Office 365 and custom development stacks. Accelerate your business by partnering with Imperitiv for your IT initiatives. When you need IT done, it's Imperitiv!

items.name: Rand Group, LLC
items.description:
Cloud Solutions for the Connected Business supporting customers seeking Cloud ERP selection and implementation, Dynamics 365/CRM/NAV/AX/GP upgrades| cloud migrations| support, and Digital Marketing Services.

Established in 2003, Rand Group provides IT engineering, ERP & CRM business application implementation, e-commerce, data analytics and Digital Marketing solutions that help companies realize the promise of Cloud computing.  With industry experience and intellectual property for the energy, oilfield services, manufacturing, distribution, and construction sectors, we provide Digital Transformation to solve complex technology problems.

Our diverse service offerings include ERP, CRM, BI, and Digital Marketing services. Headquartered in Texas, we are strategically positioned to support local business in Dallas, Houston, Denver, San Francisco/Bay Area and Vancouver, Canada.

Our Microsoft product offering includes:
- Dynamics 365 Finances & Operations (Enterprise)
- Dynamics 365 Sale (Dynamics CRM)
- Dynamics NAV (Navision)
- Dynamics AX (Axapta) Upgrades, Cloud Migrations & Support
- Dynamics GP (Great Plains) Upgrades, Cloud Migrations & Support
- Dynamics 365 Business Central
- SharePoint
- PowerBI
- Azure
- Office 365

Rand Group is the fastest growing Microsoft Dynamics ERP partner in North America including membership of Microsoft’s Elite Inner Circle – reserved for the top 1% of Microsoft Dynamics partners worldwide.  Our Proven Track Record & Outstanding Service:
- Founded in 2003
- Deep business acumen
- Multi-platform technology expertise
- 2,500+ successful engagements
- 100+ professionals
- 90% client retention 
- 55% of Rand Group clients have transitioned from another partner to Rand Group to recover a failed implementation or because of our 24/7 Support team
- Among the top 1% of all Microsoft solution providers

items.name: ULTRA INC
items.description: Connecting Point was founded back in 1979 on the belief that technology would change the world and we have helped with that change one innovation and one customer at a time.   In the last 38 years, we've grown and technology has changed, but we still have the same core beliefs.  We believe that every company is distinct in what their IT needs are.  We customize solutions from Technology Solutions, Classroom Solutions, Service and Repair of Equipment, Managed Service, and Custom Cloud Solutions.

items.name: Levi, Ray & Shoup, Inc.
items.description:
LRS Education Services is dedicated to providing quality, hands-on, information technology training solutions.  As a Microsoft Gold Partner for Learning, our staff of certified instructors have trained over 30,000 students since opening our education center doors in 1994.  We currently have two state of the art LRS Education Centers and offer over 200 information technology courses to help our students learn how to use their technology more effectively.  Additional education solutions we provide include:
- Virtual instructor-led classes
- On-site training
- Customized classes
- Private classes
- Classroom rental
- Multiple Enrollment Discounts
- Employer Personnel Guarantee
- Student Satisfaction Guarantee
- Authorized Testing Center
- Azure Training
- IT Training
- Learning and Certification
- Office 365 Training

items.name: BKD, LLP
items.description:
If your business application software has lost its edge, or you need upgrades and maintenance, consider the benefits of working with BKD Technologies.  As an authorized reseller of leading business and financial management software, we support companies with software selection, implementation and training assistance. We also help companies with strategic technology planning. 

We can help you maintain or establish a competitive edge with the help of credentialed and experienced technology professionals. Some are CPAs, and others hold the latest software certifications in their field. For our complete services, please see our website.

items.name: QCI
items.description: Founded in 1995, QCI has become the largest tech consulting firm based in Iowa. Our mission is simple: we help our clients utilize technology to succeed. To accomplish our mission, QCI is committed to attracting, developing, and challenging the best talent to deliver for our exceptional clients.

items.name: Nex-Tech Inc.
items.description: Nex-Tech provides: Network design and implementation, Windows 2016, Microsoft Office 365, Hardware service and repair, Internet Service Provider, Long distance and more.  We are a certified HP/Aruba partner specializing in Wireless LAN and WAN installation.  We also focus on managed network security products. Nex-Tech is a subsidiary of Rural Telephone, a leader in the telecommunications industry since 1951. The goal of Nex-Tech is to provide the highest quality service possible to our customers at affordable prices. Our partnership commitment to our customers is keeping you up-to-date with advances in technology and working together with you to provide the best opportunity for your success.

items.name: Henson Group
items.description: Henson group enjoys privileged access to Microsoft's Azure product group,no-public Azure Code/details,and Microsoft Azure Funding to cover most/all of your migration to Azure.Unlike other Partners, we are staffed by former Microsoft engineers including several Azure MVPs .Because of this ,we have won dozens of awards and have hundreds of clients world wide.Our expertise includes : Data Lake, Cosmos DB ,Data Factory, Analytics and IoT, Machine Learning ,Chat Bots ,Services

items.name: Phidiax, LLC
items.description:
Phidiax, LLC is a Denver, Colorado company, established in 2009, and is a Microsoft Managed Gold Partner, Systems Integrator. We are a leading solution provider of Microsoft Azure Cloud, Integration, and custom software applications. Our mission is to provide guidance and implementation expertise to our clients in the capacity of subject-matter experts on the Microsoft technology stack (Azure, BizTalk, SharePoint, SQL, BI, System Center, SOA / ESB, and Office 365).

Phidiax works closely with organizations to implement the software development life-cycle in order to provide enterprise-grade solutions that improve the Return on Investment in your technology infrastructure and application-base. Phidiax deliveries are comprised of components which live on the Microsoft .Net platform, On-Premise, Off-Premise, and Hybrid solutions. We engineer solutions within the competencies that most contribute to the overall technology success for the modern enterprise. 

Phidiax is industry agnostic, as our solutions are tuned to cater to the business vision on an isolated basis. However, we have vast expertise in the following:
    •	Healthcare
    •	Pension
    •	Finance, Trading, Banking
    •	Manufacturing

Our technology services include: 
    •	Azure Cloud
    •	Integration
    •	Cloud Datacenter
    •	Data and Visibility 


Phidiax credentials include:
    •	Microsoft Managed Gold Partner. 
    •	Microsoft P-Seller (P-TSP), Virtual Technical Specialist (VTS) for Integration. 
    •	Microsoft Azure Circle Partner, Cloud Accelerate Partner, Cloud Partner
    •	Microsoft Most Valuable Professional (MVP) Azure Integration

    •	Inc. 5000 - #1 on the 2014 Fastest Growing IT Services Companies in Colorado
    •	Inc. 5000 - #9 on the 2014 Fastest Growing Companies in Colorado
    •	Inc. 5000 - #314 on the 2014 Fastest Growing Companies in America

items.name: The Miller Group
items.description: Our IT services offering covers the typical tasks, duties and responsibilities performed by an in-house IT department along with much more. From the desktops your employees use every day, to the servers and other infrastructure components that power your business and protect your valuable data, The Miller Group offers service plans guaranteed to fit both your requirements and your budget. From network monitoring to data backup, our service model is designed to be hassle-free.

items.name: Tecnología y Servicios de Información S.A.S
items.description:
We are a services company engaged in software consulting and development, focused on implementing and designing comprehensive solutions strategies for Microsoft Tools like SharePoint, Project Server, CRM Dynamics, Office 365 (SharePoint Online, Project Online, CRM Dynamics), Azure, PowerBI, Datawarehousing, Business Intelligence & others, always aiming at our customers satisfaction with a high degree of quality.

We are Gold Partner in Collaboration & Content and Data Analytics. Silver in Application Development.

items.name: ISSQUARED, Inc.
items.description:
ISSQUARED® Inc. is a premier Microsoft Partner, and a Value-Added Solutions Provider with an established presence delivering multi-million dollar projects to Fortune 500 companies and an unshakable trust in the combined expertise of our global employees.  Our very company name underscores our belief in our core competencies of IT Security(IS) compounded with Infrastructure Solutions(IS) to forge the greatest value for the clientele of our enterprise (IS^2), better recognized as ISSQUARED®.

We have delivered lots of migrations to the Microsoft Cloud, be it Office 365 (Business / Premium / Essentials) including Skype for Business, Azure migration and deployment, Enterprise Mobility, and all other Microsoft Solutions, with a special focus on security.

Our User focused culture has spurred our growth from being named an INC. 5000 Fastest-Growing Company to an INC 500 Fastest-Growing Company.

ISSQUARED® has meticulously refined our consulting and software solutions since its inception in 2010, and now possesses specialized expertise trusted by our rapidly expanding list of partners including Amazon, IBM, and Microsoft.  Our team maintains exhaustive knowledge in delivering end-to-end, vendor-agnostic, integrated solutions, while carefully building a series of strategic, security-related relationships in order to better serve our clientele.  We utilize specific methods of implementing and operating role-based access management solutions to continuously beat expectations set in our Service Level Agreements.

items.name: TechStar Consulting Inc
items.description:
TechStar helps clients harness the power of innovation to thrive on change. 

TechStar Group is an IT Services, Product Development, and Business Solutions provider  dedicated to the implementation of the Enterprise Applications. At TechStar, we help drive customer success by leveraging our expertise in IT Solutions and Business Process improvements.

We specialize in providing high quality IT services and solutions based on SharePoint, Office 365, Azure and Private Cloud. TechStar Group is a Microsoft Gold partner for multiple Cloud disciplines and Cloud Solution Provider (CSP) under Tier 1 category working with Microsoft's customers, and working at Microsoft as a proud Cloud Partner.

Our 13+ year association with Microsoft Corporation has provided us a great opportunity to serve customers spread across 30+ countries and achieve accolades for Microsoft as well as for ourselves. We aim to provide the similar world class services and solutions to our customers.

Office365

Our deep-rooted relationship with Microsoft ensures that our clients get direct access and faster solutions to their Office 365 issues. We are a global CSP partner of Microsoft. We have experience in developing modern applications for Office, Messaging and Communication solutions leveraging cloud identity for authentication.
 We helps customers in the area of 
• Migration: We migrate all contacts, calendars & e-mails to Exchange Online. 
• Deployment: We enter all credentials and activate all accounts within the organization. 
• Transition: We provide comprehensive hands-on on-site or remote webinar training session to IT administrators, help desk staff, corporate trainers & end-users. 
• Custom Apps: We have developed customs Apps that make integration with Microsoft Office 365 ever easier. 
• Free 24X7X365 Support: We have built support model for free support for Office 365. 

Microsoft Azure Infrastructure 

TechStar Group provides consulting, planning and migration services for Microsoft Azure, including Infrastructure Migration to Microsoft Azure. 
 Features: 
• Discover: we’ll perform consultative analysis to assess and discover which applications, virtual and physical machines are an appropriate fit to migrate to Azure 
• Plan: includes design of migration plans, determining cost of application and cloud-fit, and more
• Build & Migrate: includes building tenancy, migration and technical training
